snippet: The Paradise Fund offered Palm Beach society’s young offspring the chance to give back and have some fun in Florida.
abstract: Paradise Fund's annual casino gala in Palm Beach, Fla, raises money to help fund support children's organizations around world and offers offspring of socialites chance to help others and hang out together during Thanksgiving weekend.
lead_paragraph: The Paradise Fund offered Palm Beach society’s young offspring the chance to give back and have some fun in Florida.

headline.main: A Palm Beach Fund-Raiser for the Next Generation
